name: Happy Holidays Stuffed Squash
description: The Fall & Winter bring forth an array of wonderfully funky squash with bold colours and fun shapes. Pick one you like (and that will fit in the Multipurpose Steamer) and get ready to make a delish vegetarian dish. Who says only turkeys get stuffed?
preparation:
1. Carefully cut the tops and bottoms off the squash, then cut in half and remove the seeds with a spoon. Place squash in the Multipurpose Steamer. Cover (it is okay if the lid does not completely close) and microwave on high for 12 min.
  2. Melt butter in Sauté Pan over medium-high heat. Thinly slice celery. Add to pan and cook until soft, about 2 min. 
  3. Add seasoning and water; stir to combine. Add bread cubes and cook until bread is soft and liquid has absorbed, about 2 min. 
  4. Set oven to broil.  
  5. Carefully place cooked squash open side facing up on unlined Sheet Pan. Divide stuffing between squash halves. Broil 3—4 min, until crispy and browned.
tips: For even more browning on the squash, brush with olive oil before broiling.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 2 cups mixed greens with 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.
